meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a blimp.
meanings.sent1: The blimpish balloon floated gently in the sky.
meanings.sent2: The blimpish aircraft slowly drifted above the city.
meanings.sent3: The blimpish cloud lazily moved across the horizon.
meanings.sent4: Her blimpish dress billowed in the wind like a giant balloon.
meanings.sent5: The blimpish shape of the mountain loomed in the distance.

meanings.definition: Having the qualities or characteristics of a blimp.
meanings.sent1: The blimpish vehicle was round and inflated.
meanings.sent2: The blimpish toy bobbed up and down in the air.
meanings.sent3: The blimpish pillow was soft and puffy.
meanings.sent4: His blimpish cheeks were rosy and full.
meanings.sent5: The blimpish sound of the horn echoed through the stadium.

meanings.definition: Behaving in a pompous or self-important manner.
meanings.sent1: The blimpish professor spoke down to his students.
meanings.sent2: She had a blimpish attitude that rubbed people the wrong way.
meanings.sent3: The blimpish mayor insisted on a grand parade for himself.
meanings.sent4: His blimpish behavior made him unpopular among his peers.
meanings.sent5: The blimpish CEO strutted around the office like he owned the place.
